# First informations

= Introduction =

Original author of tesseractTrainer.py Catalin Francu 
[http://groups.google.com/group/tesseract-ocr/browse_thread/thread/c4073cadb2acf820?pli=1 announced on tesseract-ocr mailing list] she do not support tesseractTrainer.py anymore. For this reason new project was created to maintain this useful script. 

Name was changed to easy distinguish from project [http://www.mushware.com/ Tesseract Trainer].

New contributors are welcome! Please have a look to [http://code.google.com/p/pytesseracttrainer/wiki/TODO TODO] for ideas.

= Requirements/dependencies =

  * [http://www.python.org python] (tested with python 2.6)
  * [http://www.pygtk.org PyGTK] (tested with 2.17)
  * [http://www.imagemagick.org/ ImageMagick] (identify)


= Features =

  * multiplatform support (tested on Linux 64 bit and Windows XP)
  * visual editor of box file
  * unicode support (from 1.01)
  * possibility to define *bold*, _italic_, and underline font per letter
  * layout of symbol from box file reflect symbols on image
  * deleting, joining, splitting of symbols/boxes
  * easy and exact way of adjusting boxes
  * different image style support (tiff, png, jpeg, bmp, gif)
